abilities.name: Green Renewal
abilities.effect: Remove 1 damage counter from Tangrowth between turns.

attacks.name: Green Acid
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If the first coin is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If the second coin is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Reaching Vine
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
